head.title: Node.js Library to Manipulate File Metadata
head.description: Enhance Node.js applications by analyzing, comparing, editing, removing, and exporting metadata of popular file formats, like PDF, Word, Excel etc.

header.title: Documents Metadata Management Node.js
header.description: Manage metadata in popular document and image formats using Node.js.

content.paragraph_1: GroupDocs.Metadata for Node.js is an advanced library that empowers you to manage metadata within various file formats. Integrate metadata viewing, editing, deletion, searching, comparison, replacement, and export functionalities into your Node.js applications. Supported formats include popular business documents like PDF, Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), Outlook emails, Project, Visio diagrams, OneNote, images (including PSD, CAD), audio, video, OpenType fonts, and metafiles.
content.paragraph_2: This library offers comprehensive features like metadata search, replacement, property comparison, and information extraction. You can export retrieved metadata to Excel, CSV, or DataSet formats. It supports commonly used metadata standards like built-in, XMP, EXIF, and custom properties within supported document formats.
content.paragraph_3: GroupDocs.Metadata for Node.js is compatible with all Node.js versions and runs seamlessly on popular operating systems (Windows, Linux, macOS) that support Node.js runtime.

content.line_6: Export Data to Excel or CSV

tab_three.description: GroupDocs.Metadata for Node.js Supported Operating Systems, Frameworks, and Package Managers:

feature_1.content: Leverage extensive capabilities to manipulate built-in and custom metadata

feature_2.content: Gain access to and delete hidden data embedded in PDF, MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint...

feature_3.content: Dynamically detect the file type at runtime using Node.js.

feature_4.content: Identify and remove digital signatures present in PDFs and Office documents.

feature_5.content: Detect password protection applied to PDF and MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint documents.

feature_6.content: Retrieve thumbnails and image previews for supported file formats & Matroska Multimedia Container Support

feature_7.content: Extract text metadata directly from PNG image files using Node.js

feature_8.content: Enumerate any metadata type and control metadata of OpenType font files

feature_9.content: Analyze specific metadata properties using defined keys for any supported format

feature_10.content: Manipulate metadata and attachments in email messages

feature_11.content: Access Matroska subtitles and metadata in audio and video files

feature_12.content: Generate Image Previews for MSG, CAD, EML or EPUB files

feature_13.content: Compare and analyze any alterations in metadata in supported file formats

feature_14.content: Collect document metadata properties like EXIF or XMP

feature_15.content: Manipulate metadata in PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and other formats

feature_16.content: Save metadata from supported files to Excel, CSV or DataSet output

feature_17.content: Use Search API to add or update XMP and EXIF metadata properties

feature_18.content: Control metadata in images including photo location information

feature_19.content: Clear business reports and documents from any metadata and comments

feature_20.content: Get metadata from Microsoft Excel Spreadsheets starting from Excel 95

feature_21.content: Make your PDF, Excel & Image Formats less memory demanding

feature_22.content: Correct content of EXIF Metadata in WEBP, PNG or PSD

feature_23.content: Get XMP Metadata nodes from MOV, MP3 & WEBP Files

feature_24.content: Manipulate IPTC Metadata Packages in TIFF Images

feature_25.content: Add, Update or Remove EXIF data in JPEG2000 Images

feature_26.content: Control EXIF tags & XMP metadata for HEIC/HEIF images

feature_27.content: Get all metadata hidden in Encrypted Microsoft Project Files

feature_1.title: Efficient Metadata Manipulation in Node.js
feature_1.content: GroupDocs.Metadata provides a comprehensive Node.js library for streamlined management of metadata within various file formats. Retrieving, manipulating, and extracting metadata properties becomes effortless with the Node.js API. feature_2.title: Simplified Data Extraction with Node.js
feature_2.content: The GroupDocs.Metadata for Node.js library empowers you to effortlessly retrieve specific hidden metadata. This simplifies metadata access and processing PDF, Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint docs within your Node.js applications. Control content of comments, hidden pages, form fields, annotations etc.

solutions.title: GroupDocs.Metadata offers data processing APIs for other popular development environments
